channel.title: Alternative for scar instead of using a VM?
channel.description: i was wondering that on windows XP when you swiched users, it still leaves the tasts running. So does this mean that it will still let scar auto for you if you swich users and go on a diffrent account on the computer?

item.title: Alternative for scar instead of using a VM?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

No sorry, remember scar takes control of your mouse

Read full topic
